summary: Implemented the requested navigation/footer label rename to “Portfolio” (still linking to /gallery) and added a UI component to display/copy a “direct portfolio link” on the Gallery page. Updated gallery media manifest paths to point at /assets/generated/*. However, the diff does not provide evidence of an actual deployment/live URL, nor does it conclusively demonstrate that the original runtime/build error is identified and fixed beyond these UI/content changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Identify and fix the error reported in the current deployed draft so the portfolio site runs without runtime errors and builds successfully (no TypeScript errors, routing errors, or missing asset-path errors).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows some UI/content updates (nav label change, gallery document.title update, gallery media paths), but does not show what the original error was or provide evidence that the build/runtime issue is fully resolved across all routes (e.g., no TypeScript/build output, no mention of fixed routing errors, and only partial evidence of asset-path correctness).

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy/publish the regenerated build and provide the direct live URL to the portfolio page (the deployed site URL plus /gallery).
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff summary of deployment configuration changes or any produced/public live URL. The added component computes a URL at runtime from window.location.origin, but that is not the same as providing a deployed live URL.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an on-page “Share this portfolio” card with copy-to-clipboard functionality and an external link icon on the /gallery page.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-20 asks to deploy and provide a direct live URL; it does not explicitly request adding new UI/UX on the Gallery page for copying/sharing the link.
